name: Yeabsra Gezahegn Belete
text: Yo, after you eat a hungry Howie's pizza make sure you wash your hand! Why?...because if you don't, then you will continue eating your hand!

name: Erica Sinner
text: Great pizza. Great service. It was my husband's first time and he loved it!

name: Fefe Jenkins
text: Me and my family eat here very often. Love the fast and quick services! Food is pretty good !

name: Scott Forsythe
text: Hungry Howie's is a pizza that is, above all, college fare. That said, it's a bit higher price for the food.

name: Alex Bishop
text: I absolutely LOVE this place! I've probably ordered pizza here 30-40 times and it has been exceptional EVERY time! They really market the flavored crust but personally that's not my thing. Even if it isn't your thing, the pizza is still …More

name: Philip Heindel
text: The service here is exceptional. When I ordered my pizza online, I accidentally ordered it for the wrong store. When I came here to pick it up and they realized the mistake, they said they'd make me the pizza here at no extra charge, and …More

name: Taylor zickafoose
text: Love their pizza sooo much

name: Charlie Judd
text: Was decently good

name: Mariann S
text: I love their pizza. Crust is yummy.....sauce is very tasty, not salty like (pizza hut) all the veggies are fresh, all in all HH's is the best!!

name: Parker Worpell
text: This location takes the cake. It’s my favorite place to order. Everyone is so friendly, always on time, order is always right, I just can’t express how well they do. I don’t ever review places, but this team deserves the credit. They have it together and the food is always sooooo bomb. Thanks everyone for making this location great.

name: Christopher Carr
text: Good Pizza ... great price... Can't complain!!!

name: danniel clifford
text: Favorite pizza place

name: Amy Kintz
text: Love love love their Pizza and subs oh and salad is amazing too.

name: Greg Kirkman
text: Fast, tasty, nice staff, good prices and deals, online ordering was a snap! never tried them before since I'm from out of town but they are now on my list to return the next time I'm back for work!

name: Michelle Henry
text: My favorite pizza in fort wayne

name: Ashley Stevens
text: Never had a problem with my order. They are all so friendly! The online app is super easy. I order here at least 3 times a month!

name: Denise Hull
text: Very fresh and awesome service

name: jordan debrosky
text: Best pizza crust ever. I'm sad they're no longer in Auburn.

name: Cameron Meekma
text: Staff provides friendly service and the food is excellent at an affordable price! Will be back again and again and again!

name: Angela Alleshouse
text: My opinion absolutely great pizza love the flavored crust...I always mix my Crust flavoring.. garlic herb ,butter cheese ,ranch & asiago

name: Andrew Ungemach
text: Alex Halsey kills it

name: Ashley Grant
text: Ordering and timing was great however the crust topping used was sticky and made eating the pizza almost a complete turn off which is sad since it was our first experience with Hungry Howies. Also, the app doesn't explain anything in the way of the rewards system.

name: Brooke Curry
text: The subs are my favorite!

name: Lisa Mcclellan
text: Ordered barbeque chicken pizza..no barbeque sauce !!  Not the best pizza

name: Veronica Taylor
text: Very upset w/ this location... We ordered delivery Sat 1/26 and received food no problem at all..  Today 1/31 ordered delivery.. We received a phone call from "co owner" Jason almost 30 mins after our order was placed, confirmed and payed …More

name: Enoch Fedah
text: My favorite place to get Pizza

name: Dennis Campbell
text: Good service better food

name: Tyler Langston
text: I give 2 stars only because delivery was fast on a Friday night. But that's probably because their food is pre made. Everything tasted like plastic. I think I'll stick with Jets

name: Cindy Greider
text: Fast Service , friendly staff .Great food for a good price.

name: Kyle Mikels
text: Very fast service

name: Brad Pitt
text:
Fast delivery but the pizza was so thin the toppings and cheese all fell off..
very disappointed

name: Joel Frey
text: Very good pizza for the price. Howie's bread is always delicious. The deilvery took about 40 minutes, but it was Friday night so that's normal.

name: game love
text: New store. Clean. Courteous staff. Timely. Piping hot pizza. Not great, but not bad either. A notch above Little Caesars.

name: Carla BeingMe
text: The only reason I still order their pizza is cuz I like it. The employees are unbelievable. There is ALWAYS some issue!! This time, its been an HOUR and I still have no pizza. I called at 45 mins and told it should be here any minute. Really think this is the last time. Can't handle it anymore.

name: Brad M
text: So happy they opened another location on the north side of town! The pizza is delicious and the prices are reasonable when compared to other local places.

name: Chelsea Jordan
text: Favorite pizza! One thing they could do better tho is put "extra"when you order and pay for extra.

name: Joseph Shell
text: They have pretty good deals Monday thru Thursday, but that's the only reason I go there, the pizza is so-so.

name: Austin Northcutt
text: Friendly employees. The pizza isn't bad but it's not great. I prefer other places pizza but Hungry Howies is a little cheaper. Their breadsticks are fantastic though.

name: Rachel
text: Their pizza gave me indigestion and it wasn't even worth it. Two stars for the on-time delivery, and the fact that it was still a pizza.

name: Brook & Eric Neal
text: Delicious pizza! Check for online deals and rewards for the best value!

name: MOANA ME DIRECT Knows what
text: I only go there for one thing garlic crust pizza with cheese and double the green olives

name: M
text: Has a nice cashier and food was purty good

name: MaryAnn Brunner
text: I would never order from here again!! I’m from out of town and I called to place a order at 10:40pm and I call to see when my order would be here & all they could tell me is that my Oder wasn’t placed

name: Dave B
text: Fresh, friendly, fast and inexpensive!  Great place for pizza!

name: Matt McGill
text: I had a pizza and the Howie's Bread. Both were pretty good for a fair price.

name: Karla Stranger
text: Not perfect but was good.

name: Stacy Clegg
text: Becoming one of favorite pizza places!

name: Hannah Slater
text: Great gluten free pizza!

name: Susan Peppler
text: It is close by and reasonable  price

name: Trucker Old Dad
text: Flavored crust is off the chain

name: shyla smith
text: It's good

name: Hans Herbst
text: Awesome pizza!

name: Robert Wallace
text: Fast and convenient.

name: Rosco Jennings
text: I like Hungry Howie's
